name: @awesome-database-backup/file-backup
description: Backup data stored in a file system and store to Amazon S3 or Google Cloud Storage. You can set a custom S3 endpoint to use S3 based services like DigitalOcean Spaces instead of Amazon S3.
author: Ryu Sato <ryu@weseek.co.jp>

scripts.//test:performance:tempfile_mode: cross-env NODE_ENV=test VITEST_ENV=performance vitest run --passWithNoTests --testNamePattern '\[tempfile mode\]'
scripts.//test:performance:stream_mode: cross-env NODE_ENV=test VITEST_ENV=performance vitest run --passWithNoTests --testNamePattern '\[stream mode\]'
scripts.test:performance:tempfile_mode: node dist/apps/file-backup/src/backup.js --gcp-endpoint-url http://fake-gcs-server:4443 --gcp-project-id valid_project_id --gcp-client-email valid@example.com --gcp-private-key valid_private_key --backup-tool-options "-v /tmp/256mb" --target-bucket-url gs://test-performance --save-with-tempfile
scripts.test:performance:stream_mode: node dist/apps/file-backup/src/backup.js --gcp-endpoint-url http://fake-gcs-server:4443 --gcp-project-id valid_project_id --gcp-client-email valid@example.com --gcp-private-key valid_private_key --backup-tool-options "-v /tmp/256mb" --target-bucket-url gs://test-performance
